Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Umhlobo wakhe (uSathana) uya kuthi: “Nkosi yethu, asindim owamenza ukuba abe ngumgabadeli koko nguye ngokwakhe owaba sekulahlekeni (okwambeka) kude.”
(UAllâh) Uya kuthi: “Musani ukuphikisana phambi kwaM, ekubeni Ndandinilumkisile kwangenxa engaphambili.”
Ilizwi (elingummiselo) aliyi kuguqulwa kuM yaye Andisokuze Ndibe ngumsweli bulungisa kwizicaka
NgeMini eSiya kuthi esiHogweni: “Ingaba ugcwele? Siya (kuphendula) sona sithi: “Ingaba kusekho abanye na?”
Ke kaloku iPaladesi iya kusondezwa kubenzi bokulungileyo, ingabi kude
(Kuya kuthiwa): “Oku koko nanithenjiswe ngako (oko) kokwakhe wonke ongumbuyeli kuAllâh nomgcini womnqophiso waKhe
Owamoyikayo uSozinceba, Ongabonwayo, wabuyela (kuYe) ngentliziyo (enenguquko)
Ngena kuyo (iPaladesi) ngoxolo. Le yiMini yaphakade.”
Baya kufumana konke abakunqwenelayo apho, yaye kuThi kusekho nokunye okungaphaya koko
Kanti zingaphi izizukulwana eSazitshabalalisayo ngaphambili kunabo, ezazinkulu kunabo ngamandla zityhutyhe ilizwe lonke, ikhona phofu indawo yokubalekela
Inene kuko oko kukho inkumbuzo kuye nabani na ophulaphulayo lo gama ekho (ngokwasengqondweni)
Sawadala ngenene amazulu nomhlaba noko kuphakathi kuwo ngeentsuku ezintandathu kwaye akukho kudinwa kwaSichukumisayo
Ke wena yiba nomonde ngoko bakutshoyo, uzukise (uAllâh) ngendumiso yeNkosi yakho phambi kokuphuma kwelanga naphambi kokutshona kwalo
(Nakwinxalenye) yobusuku. Mzukise nasemva kokuqubuda (emthandazweni)
Ke kaloku uphulaphule ngeMini xa uMmemezi eya kumemeza kwindawo ekufuphi
NgeMini abaya kuva isithonga ngenyaniso. Leyo yiMini yokuphuma (emangcwabeni)
Inene Sithi abanika ubomi Senze nokufa yaye kuThi kulapho kuza kuphelelwa khona
NgeMini umhlaba uya kuzahlukanisa nabo (baze baphume emangcwabeni abo) ngesaquphe; olo luqokelelo olulula kuThi
Sikwazi kakuhle abakuthethayo, yaye wena awungomnyanzelisi phezu kwabo (wokubenza bakholwe ngenkani) kodwa ke wena khumbuza nge’Kur’ân nabani na lowo usoyikayo isilumkiso saM
Ndifunga (ngeMimoya) evuthuzayo
(Nangamafu) athwala umthwalo onzima wamanzi
Nangee(nqanawa) eziwiza kalula nangocoselelo
Nangezo (ngelosi) zahlulahlula (izinto) ngokomyalelo (ka- Allâh)
Inene oko nithenjiswe ngako kuyinyaniso
Kananjalo inene imbuyekezo iza kwenzeka
Ndifunga nangamazulu aneendlela
Inene nina nahlukile ngeentetho
Olahlekileyo	wakude	kuyo	(i’Kur’ân)	ngulowo ulahlekisiweyo
Abatshabalalayo ngamaxoki
Abaphantsi kwesigqubuthelo bengenanyameko
Bayabuza, “Inini na iMini yembuyekezo?”
(Leyo) yiMini abaya kujingiswa ngayo eMlilweni
(Kananjalo kuza kuthiwa kubo): “Ngcamlani isohlwayo senu ke. Oku koko naningenamonde ngako.”
Inene wona amalungisa aya kuba phakathi kweMiyezo nemithombo
Esamkela oko iNkosi yawo Iwanike kona. Kaloku wona aye aba ngabenzi bokulungileyo kwangaphambili
Wona ayelala kancinane ebusuku
Nangeeyure eziphambi konyezi ayeye acele itarhu (kuAllâh)
Kantinasebutyebinibawo(kwakuyekukhutshwe) amalungelo (abahlwempuzekileyo), abangqibi nababandazelekileyo
Ke kaloku emhlabeni kukho imiqondiso kwabanyanisekileyo (elukholweni)
Nakuni buqu. Kanti aniboni na
Nasezulwini kukho imbonelelo yenu yako konke enithenjiswe ngako
Ke kaloku (Ndifunga) ngeNkosi yamazulu nomhlaba, inene yona (i’Kur’ân) yinyaniso enjengokuba nithetha
Ingaba ibali leendwendwe ezixabisekileyo zikaIbrâhîm lifikile na kuwe
Ekungeneni kwazo emzini wakhe zathi: “(Siya nibulisa) ngoxolo. Waphendula yena, (nakuni makube) luxolo, nina ningabantu abangaziwayo.”
Wahamba waya kusapho lwakhe wabuya nenyama yethole elityetyisiweyo elojiweyo
Walibeka phambi kwazo (iindwendwe ezo); wathi: “Aniyi kutya na?”
Waziva enokuzoyika. Zathi zona: “Ungoyiki,” zamnika iindaba ezivuyisayo zenkwenkwana enolwazi
Ke kaloku umkakhe weza kuye ngesikhalo (somothuko) ezibetha ubuso bakhe, esithi: “(Mna ndingumfazi) oludlolwazana nje!”
Zathi zona: Itsho njalo ke iNkosi yakho; inene yona nguSolubabalo, uSolwazi
